raw_title: PARAMSOTHY – SRI RANJAN, FCA. Loving husband of Chandrani
raw_body: PARAMSOTHY – SRI RANJAN, FCA. Loving husband of Chandrani (Rita, Chandi), father of Dr. Mario Ranjeevan (Denmark) and Dr. Johann Kandhipan, Cherished son of Manonmany and Thambapillai Paramsothy, brother of Lekha and brother-in-law of Edmond Paulpillai (UK) and brother-in-law of the late Selvaranee (Anne Christine) and the late Rajah Asirwatham and of Pushparani (Cecilia), Jeyarani (Irene) and the late V.P. Vedanayagam and Yogarani (Therese) and
